trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Aspen Hill
There were no other sightings in Aspen Hill on or around July 14th 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: From my 2nd floor balcony facing east (I think) and started filming video
divs: Sighting DetailsBasically I went out on my 2nd floor balcony with my camera as I've gotten some interesting pics at dusk and at night; and watched the sky for a couple minutes before I saw a steady white light in the sky in the east. I first thought it was a plane, so I trained my camera on the light, viewed it and decided it didn't look like a plane. I decided I would film it and see what I had captured after uploading it to my computer. I pressed REC and started filming. I tried to keep the object which was blinking and moving about, centered in the viewfinder and followed it until it disappeared completely. The object looked like a circular light, then yellow and red in the viewfinder. After a few seconds, I pressed REC again to stop filming. I couldn't hear any plane sound and I have no idea how far away it was. It was a distance because I zoomed in to get the pictures I did. I captured these stills from the video I took. One shows an entity inside the disk. Now my feelings and reaction after viewing them on the computer as stills is total shock, fright and amazement.
